Articles.Content: The Ship is a Modified Aeris A4 that I named the "Wasp" It's a shuttle that goes into deep Kerbin orbit and can even reach the orbit of Duna and Eve. The giant thing is the Kerbin Space Cruiser "Cazadore" which is a Fallout Reference. It's an inter-planetary cruiser that can go out as far as Dres by itself, however can be slingshot out to the Orbit of Jool.
